abstract.description:
BTagCSV dataset in NanoAOD format enhanced with Particle Flow candidates, readable with bare ROOT or other ROOT-compatible software. In addition to the default NanoAOD content, it contains candidates from the Particle Flow algorithm. Their properties are available in the "PFCands" collection. This dataset was derived from the primary dataset in MiniAOD format linked below.

The list of validated runs, which must be applied to all analyses, either with the full validation or for an analysis requiring only muons, can be found in:

methodology.description: The dataset was produced with the software available in the record linked below.

title: BTagCSV dataset in NanoAOD format enhanced with Particle Flow candidates from RunG of 2016

usage.description: You can access these data through XRootD protocol or direct download, and they can be analysed with common ROOT and Python tools. See the instructions for getting started in

validation.description: These data were processed from the MiniAOD primary dataset. If not equal to the parent, the processed runs and lumi sections are available below.
